Name: Aetherwall
Description: Cover from ranged attacks further away than range 2.

Name: Amalgamate
Description: While this character is not incapacitated, whenever a relict is defeated anywhere on the battlefield, another relict of the Grafter's choice gains vigor 1.

Name: Amorphous
Description: Can share space with other characters. Any characters that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage.

Name: Arkentech Shock Shield
Description: Has resistance to all damage from closest foe. If multiple foes are equidistant, this trait applies to all of them.

Name: Armor [X]
Description: Reduce all damage taken by [X].

Name: Aura of Immortality
Description: While Immortal is undefeated, it has Aura 2. Relict inside without this trait cannot be reduced past 1 HP.

Name: Aura of Rot
Description: Aura 2. Foes that end their turn in the aura lose all vigor, then take 2 piercing damage.

Name: Aura of Shielding
Description: Aura 1. The abjurer and allies in the area have dodge.

Name: Aura of the Endless Legion
Description: Aura 2. When any relict is defeated in the aura, summon a relict husk mob in a free space in the aura.

Name: Automata
Description: This character always attempts to attack and focus on the closest foe at the start of its turn.

Name: Beyond Death
Description: When defiance activates, roll a d6. On a 4+, this character immediately regains defiance. Attacks with True Strike bypass this trait.

Name: Black Sun Ritual
Description: A Vessel Knight rises again after 4d6 days unless its heart is destroyed.

Name: Bullheaded
Description: Has resistance unless suffering from a status.

Name: Command Aura [X]
Description: Aura [X]. Allies in the aura have +1 boon on attacks.

Name: Counter
Description: Deal 2 damage to your attacker after being attacked, hit or miss.

Name: Defiance
Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Name: Divine Presence
Description: Immune to stun

Name: Dodge
Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Name: Duty of Death
Description: Adjacent allies to this character without this trait have dodge.

Name: Elite
Description: Takes 2 turns.

Name: Enrage
Description: While bloody, gain +1 action.

Actions.Name: Eternal
Actions.Description: Clear a status, mark, or all blights affecting either the Lich's Body or Soul.

Name: Eternal Rage
Description: When defeated, instead become intangible until the end of their next turn. At the end of that turn, become defeated.

Name: Eternal War
Description: While the Immortalist is on the battlefield and not defeated, all relict gain Rise Again: This character has a chance to rise again when defeated. Roll 1d6 at the start of each round. On a 4+, this character gets back up at 25% hp. If all characters with this trait are defeated, it deactivates.

Name: Ethereal
Description: Has phasing and resistance unless there's an adjacent foe.

Name: Flying
Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Name: Fortify
Description: This character gains Vigilance 1 at the end of their turn.

Name: Greenwalker
Description: Immune to difficult terrain.

Name: Grit
Description: Sturdy when bloodied.

Name: Heavy Armor
Description: Resistant to abilities used from adjacent spaces.

Name: Hold the Line
Description: If the Sentinel ends any turn without attacking, they gain Sturdy until the start of their next turn and Vigilance 3.

Name: Hollow
Description: The Stutterghast has aura 1. While there is exactly 1 other character in hollow's aura, it has have evasion and stealth. This aura has no effect if no other characters, or 2 or more other characters are inside, and its effects (including stealth) turn off it if deactivates.

Name: Immortal Disregard
Description: Attacks never miss the Immortal.

Name: Insulated
Description: Immune to damage from terrain and terrain effects.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: Clear a status, mark, or all blights.

Name: Legend
Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Name: Legion
Description: A foe with this trait has reduced stats but costs half the encounter points. Up to two foes with Legion can take their turns at the same time.

Name: Living Lightning
Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified take 2 damage, but only the first time on a turn. Allied spaces cost 0 movement to pass through.

Name: Living Statue
Description: Cannot dash. When defeated, becomes a height 2 piece of terrain.

Name: Malice
Description: After attacking this character, a foe is marked, gaining a stack of malice. Malice stacks indefinitely. This character gains +1 boon on attacks and deals +[D] on hit or miss against a foe for each stack of malice. Malice can also be inflicted by other means. If a character suffering from Malice doesn't attack during their turn, at the end of their turn clear all stacks of Malice. It can also be cleared by anything that clears a mark, but doing so only clears one at a time.

Name: Martyrdom
Description: When defeated, grants vigor 1 to all allies in range 2.

Name: Mob
Description: This character doesn't trigger slay effects.

Name: Nimble
Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Name: Open Rift
Description: Create a pit under any character hit by the wraith's attacks.

Name: Overdrive [X]
Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round [X] or later.

Name: Phasing
Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Name: Plasma Bomb
Description: At the start of the round, the Warmech fires a plasma bomb into the air, targeted on any visible space. The bomb marks a blast 2 area visible to all characters. At the end of the round, the bomb comes down as an area effect. Characters in the area must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and become stunned, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. The targeted space then becomes a pit. The Warmech is immune to its own bombs.

Name: Release Passengers
Description: When defeated, summon 5 relict husk mobs in or adjacent to its space.

Name: Rise Again
Description: This character has a chance to rise again when defeated. Roll 1d6 at the start of each round. On a 4+, this character gets back up at 25% hp. If all characters with this trait are defeated, it deactivates.

Name: Shambling
Description: Cannot dash.

Name: Shed Flesh
Description: When bloodied, immediately recharges and uses Horrify. For the rest of combat, becomes phasing and flying.

Name: Shelter
Description: +1 boon on saves.

Name: Shuffle
Description: All relict can move 1 space forward at the start of their turn as a free action. When they do this, they can also move any relict with this trait that are contiguously connected to them via adjacency. When shuffle activates for mobs, it activates for all five simultaneously.

Name: Size [X]
Description: This character takes up a [X] by [X] area of spaces.

Name: Skirmisher
Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Name: Slippery
Description: While bloodied, has evasion.

Name: Soul Mastery
Description:
The Lich occupies two size 1 entities, which are functionally the same character but track statuses separately. One is the Lich's body, the other is its soul. When the lich makes movement or takes action, it can do so with either its body or soul.
- The Lich's body is sturdy, cannot dash, and has Aetherwall.
- The Lich's soul has flying and speed 6.
At the start of combat, the Lich's soul is intangible. At the start of round 2, this switches, and the Lich's body becomes intangible (while its soul loses this status). This continues to swap until the Lich is defeated.

Name: Spectral Form
Description: Loses all armor, but gains phasing, flying, and speed 6.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: Resistance when adjacent to an object.

Name: Sturdy
Description: Immune to shove, dazed, and stunned.

Name: Stutter
Description: When a foe takes an action in range 3 of the ghast, it may teleport 1 and deal 1 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Surreality
Description: Starts at 50% hp with vigor 1.

Name: The Old Blood
Description: Immune to blights.

Name: Unstable
Description: When defeated, explodes in a blast 1 explosion centered on the wraith. Characters inside take 2[D] piercing damage as an area effect. The wraith is then removed from the battlefield.
